Cement.description: The amount of cement used in the concrete mixture, in kilograms.

Blast Furnace Slag.description: The amount of blast furnace slag used in the concrete mixture, in kilograms.

Fly Ash.description: The amount of fly ash used in the concrete mixture, in kilograms.

Water.description: The amount of water used in the concrete mixture, in kilograms.

Superplasticizer.description: The amount of superplasticizer used in the concrete mixture, in kilograms.

Coarse Aggregate.description: The amount of coarse aggregate used in the concrete mixture, in kilograms.

Fine Aggregate.description: The amount of fine aggregate used in the concrete mixture, in kilograms.

Age.description: The age of the concrete, in days.

Strength.description: The compressive strength of the concrete, in MegaPascals.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in civil engineering and material science.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the composition and age of the concrete, please predict its compressive strength.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted compressive strength of the concrete is __.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in civil engineering and material science.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the composition and strength of the concrete, please predict its age.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted age of the concrete is __.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in civil engineering and material science.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the other components and strength of the concrete, please predict the amount of cement used.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted amount of cement used in the concrete is __.
